thread.title: L Fest: The UK's only Lesbian music festival is held in Loughborough - Leicester Mercury

author: Dan Martin
title: L Fest: The UK's only Lesbian music festival is held in Loughborough - Leicester Mercury
text:
Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Share 
The UK’s only lesbian music, arts and comedy festival has been held in the grounds of a country house. 
L Fest has previously been held in Uttoxeter but this year the event, a popular fixture in the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer or questioning and intersex calendar, switched venue to Prestwold Hall, near Loughborough at the weekend. Read More Loughborough MP Nicky Morgan calls police after Twitter troll's 'Jo Cox' Brexit threat 
L Fest’s organisers said they wanted to create a place where women celebrate and get together, feel safe and included, could make friends or just feel comfortable walking around holding their partner's hand in a very relaxed and friendly environment. 
Artists who have performed this year include Sian Evan, Perth’s Songstress Toby, Terry Logan, Elle Robertson, Britt Kusserow ang Georgia Burgess.
